titleStmt.title: Revenge for honour a tragedie / by George Chapman.
titleStmt.author: Chapman, George, 1559?-1634.
Glapthorne, Henry. Paraside. 1654.

notesStmt.note: The ascription to Chapman is not generally accepted. Has been identified with "The paraside, or, Revenge for honour", a play registered 1653 as the work of Henry Glapthorne. Cf. Parrott, T.M., ed. Plays and poems of George Chapman, the tragedies, p. 713-720; Thomas, D.L. Modern philology, Apr. 1908, p. 617-636; Cambridge hist. of Engl. lit., v. 6.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
